entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 41 %

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h through mainland inlets and valleys near noon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
